 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁטַח‎</span>] **verb** ==spread, spread abroad== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***spread out***; so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְּׁטַח‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַשֶּׁמֶשׁ וּטָחוּם‎</span> [[Jer.8.2|Jer 8:2]] ***they shall spread them abroad, etc***., accusative of many separate things, so ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַקתִּשְׁטַךְ‎</span> [[2Sam.17.19|2Sam 17:19]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location; distinguished from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַשׂ‎</span> ***spread*** covering); 3 masculine plural + ***infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁטְחוּ לָהֶם שָׁטוֺחַ‎</span> [[Num.11.32|Num 11:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***they spread*** (that is, the quails) ***for themselves all abroad*** round about the camp (i.e. to dry them; [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] siccaverunt; compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Gray|Gray]]); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁטֵחַ לַנּוֺיִם‎</span> [[Job.12.23|Job 12:23]] ***expanding the nations*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> **3 b**). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁטַּחְתִּי אֵלֶיךָ כַפָּ֑י‎</span> [[Ps.88.10|Ps 88:10]] ***I have spread out unto thee my palms***.
